name: 5 days of winter
description:
These are the final days of winter, you must protect your family from the evil ice men, gatter wood; show arrows. Are you a bad enough fella to make it?

Controls:
- Arrow keys for movenet (or wasd)
- X to chop wood (hit a tree)
- C show arrows

Code by riktothepast, art by Gwen for the Independence day jam!.

song: http://opengameart.org/content/battle-in-the-winte...
